title: balneum Abascantis et Mamertini
description: The balneum Abascanti were baths near the Porta Capena that were possibly built by T. Flavius Abascantus, the freedman of Domitian. Also near the Porta Capena were the balneum Mamertini, possibly dedicated by Sex. Petronius Mamertinus, praetorian prefect in 139-143 CE.
